member.name: PROCESS_MITIGATION_IMAGE_LOAD_POLICY
member.summary: Contains process mitigation policy settings for the loading of images from a remote device.

member.name: PROCESS_MITIGATION_IMAGE_LOAD_POLICY.DUMMYUNIONNAME.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.NoRemoteImages
member.summary: Set (0x1) to prevent the process from loading images from a remote device, such as a UNC share; otherwise leave unset (0x0).

member.name: PROCESS_MITIGATION_IMAGE_LOAD_POLICY.DUMMYUNIONNAME.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.NoLowMandatoryLabelImages
member.summary: Set (0x1) to prevent the process from loading images that have a Low mandatory label, as written by low IL; otherwise leave unset (0x0).

member.name: PROCESS_MITIGATION_IMAGE_LOAD_POLICY.DUMMYUNIONNAME.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.PreferSystem32Images
member.summary: Set (0x1) to search for images to load in the System32 subfolder of the folder in which Windows is installed first, then in the application directory in the standard DLL search order; otherwise leave unset (0x0).
